subject: Create skill data models and enums
description:
Create the data models and enums for the skills subsystem in `src/mamba_agents/skills/config.py`.

Define the following types per Section 7.3:

**Enums:**
- `SkillScope(str, Enum)` — `PROJECT`, `USER`, `CUSTOM`
- `TrustLevel(str, Enum)` — `TRUSTED`, `UNTRUSTED`

**Data Models:**
- `SkillInfo` (dataclass) — Metadata about a discovered skill (loaded eagerly):
  - `name: str` — validated identifier
  - `description: str` — what the skill does
  - `path: Path` — directory containing SKILL.md
  - `scope: SkillScope` — project | user | custom
  - Optional fields: license, compatibility, metadata, allowed_tools, model, execution_mode, agent, disable_model_invocation, user_invocable, argument_hint, hooks, trust_level

- `Skill(BaseModel)` — Full skill with loaded content:
  - `info: SkillInfo`
  - `body: str | None = None` (lazy loaded)
  - `is_active: bool = False`
  - `_tools: list[Callable] = PrivateAttr(default_factory=list)`

- `SkillConfig(BaseModel)` — Configuration for the skill subsystem:
  - `skills_dirs`, `user_skills_dir`, `custom_paths`, `auto_discover`, `namespace_tools`, `trusted_paths`

- `ValidationResult` (dataclass):
  - `valid: bool`, `errors: list[str]`, `warnings: list[str]`, `skill_path: Path | None`, `trust_level: TrustLevel | None`

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] All enums define correct values
- [ ] `SkillInfo` stores all frontmatter fields from Agent Skills spec + mamba extensions
- [ ] `Skill` wraps `SkillInfo` with lazy-loaded body
- [ ] `SkillConfig` has correct defaults (`.mamba/skills/`, `~/.mamba/skills/`)
- [ ] `ValidationResult` tracks errors, warnings, and trust level

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] `SkillInfo` handles all optional fields as None by default
- [ ] `SkillConfig.user_skills_dir` expands `~` to home directory
- [ ] `Skill` model serialization excludes private `_tools` attribute

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] Pydantic validation catches invalid field types at construction time

**Testing Requirements:**
• Unit: Enum member values and string conversion
• Unit: SkillInfo construction with minimal fields (name, description, path, scope)
• Unit: SkillInfo construction with all optional fields
• Unit: SkillConfig default values
• Unit: Skill model with PrivateAttr tools list
• Unit: ValidationResult construction

Source: internal/specs/skills-and-subagents-SPEC.md Section 7.3
